commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Oh, Aqours' performance is about to start.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Woo! I gotta go see it!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Kotori, Umi, you guys should come too.

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: For sure! I'm coming!

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: I will. This will be the perfect opportunity to watch and learn.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Ayumu, Ai, Rina? You also wanna come along to watch Aqours perform?

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: What?! Is it already time for their live show? That's a performance I just can't miss!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I wanna go too. Rina-chan Board says, "Dazzle."

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Me too. I just know Aqours' live show will be amazing.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Did you know that Chika and the others were even practicing their dance routine this morning at the beach in Odaiba?

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: No way! This morning too?!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Yup. Emma said she saw them on her early-morning walk.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: I guess that's what sets them apart! We also saw them practicing early in the morning back when we were in Numazu, didn't we?

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: I can definitely see how their synchronized dances are perfectly timed. They must really put a lot of effort into building on their practice.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Aqours practicing their synchronized dances backed by the AQUAmarine waters of Odaiba's beach.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I wouldn't exactly say the waters of that beach are aquamarine...

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Come on! Don't sweat the details!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Gahhh! I really can't wait to watch them perform!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: It's still a little early, but let's go!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: And that was Wake up Challenger!!!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Wow.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Incredible.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Yeah. I've seen them practice numerous times in the past, but that was on a completely different level!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: That was insane, seeing the real-deal Aqours.

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Totally. Aqours is awesome. Just outta this world!

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: While it was a given that Aqours' performance was amazing, the sense of unity amongst the audience was quite remarkable as well.

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: It was as if the hearts of everyone here became one beating heart of solidarity.

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: I got goosebumps from all of the excitement!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Starting with the next song, how about we get up right next to them to cheer them on? What do you think?

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: I was just about to suggest that!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: It's hard to stick around out here to watch them, right?!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: The person next to us said they'd lend us some of their light sticks!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: This many of them? Thank you. Rina-chan Board says, "Bow."

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Arrrrggghhh! I can't hold back any longer! Let's go, Umi!

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Right! I will now show them what it looks like when I get serious about supporting them!

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: When you get serious about supporting them? What does that mean?! Umi?!

commands.speaker: Honoka
commands.line: Getting serious means exactly that! Time to cheer our hearts out for them!

commands.speaker: Umi
commands.line: Yeah!

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: Whaaat?!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: *Chuckle* We can't let them upstage us!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: I'm gonna cheer like crazy for 's' live show as well, so make sure you find me!

commands.speaker: Kotori
commands.line: And I'm gonna scream my lungs out for all of Nijigasaki's performances, too!

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: So happy. Rina-chan Board says, "Warm and fuzzy."

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: In case you missed it earlier, we're Aqours! Thank you for coming today!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: The School Idol Festival is an event put together by school idols and the people who kindly support school idols!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: Everyone here loves school idols.

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: We have been able to pull off this huge event because school idols have brought us all together!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: School idols are amazing! They're awesome, right?!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: All right, let's get even more hyped up together and create something awesome beyond the awesome you already know!

commands.speaker: Chika
commands.line: The next song is...
